text: Malaa, mee ga gahi mai Jehoiada, di nadau dagi, ga helekai gi mee gi hagamodongoohia, “Goe e aha dela goe digi heia digau Levi gi hagabudu ina nia dagitedi mai Judah mo Jerusalem. Moses, tangada hai hegau Dimaadua, ne haganoho bolo nia daangada le e hui nadau dagitedi e hagamaamaa di Hale Laa dela e noho ai Dimaadua.”24.6 Exodus 30.11-16
